all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
For by my Spirit will I enlighten them, and by my power will I make known unto them the secrets of my will—yea, even those things which eye has not seen, nor ear heard, nor yet entered into the heart of man.
Doctrine and Covenants 76:10
Quote of the Day
"Each of us can transform our discipleship into a higher pattern of spirituality by making … reverence a sacred part of our spiritual character."
Elder Ulisses Soares | 1 Apr 2025General Conference
